tags.name: Brand
tags.description: The Brands module in this application represents various car manufacturers or brands that are part of the system. This module is essential for managing all information related to car brands, including adding new brands, retrieving a list of available brands, updating details of existing brands, and deleting brands that are no longer relevant.

tags.name: Location
tags.description: The Locations module in this application is responsible for managing geographical locations related to the system, such as pickup and drop-off points for car rentals or services. This module allows admin to add new locations with specific attributes like address and GPS coordinates, retrieve a list of existing locations, update details of these locations, and delete those that are no longer necessary. This functionality is crucial for providing accurate, location-based services, helping ensure smooth operations related to pickups, drop-offs, and other location-dependent features.

tags.name: Car
tags.description: The Cars module in this application is responsible for managing the vehicles available for rental or service. This module allows admins to add, view, update, and delete car listings, each with detailed attributes such as brand, model, rental price, transmission type, number of seats, fuel type, and more. Additionally, it supports managing car availability, including rental periods, pickup and drop-off locations, and maintenance statuses.

tags.name: Car-Reviews
tags.description: The Car Reviews module in this application is responsible for managing user reviews of cars available for rental or service. This module allows users to submit, view, and manage reviews for specific cars, with each review containing details about the userâ€™s experience and rating.

tags.name: Discount
tags.description: The Discount API allows you to manage discount promotions on cars by providing endpoints to create, retrieve, update, and delete discount entries. Each discount is tied to a specific car and is defined by a start and end date, as well as a discount percentage.

tags.name: Order
tags.description:
API endpoints related to managing orders placed by users.

Orders involve car rentals, where a user can make an order, check the status, and view related details such as pickup/dropoff dates, total price, and payment state.
